statements: SELECT * FROM student_assessment_results WHERE score >= 80
SELECT student_id, assessment_name FROM student_assessment_results WHERE assessment_name LIKE 'Math%' ORDER BY score DESC
SELECT assessment_name, feedback FROM student_assessment_results ORDER BY assessment_name
SELECT * FROM student_assessment_results WHERE feedback IS NOT NULL
SELECT student_id, score FROM student_assessment_results WHERE student_id IN (123, 456, 789)
SELECT student_id, assessment_name, score, feedback FROM student_assessment_results WHERE student_id = 1
SELECT * FROM student_assessment_results WHERE assessment_name LIKE 'Science%'
SELECT student_id, assessment_name, feedback FROM student_assessment_results ORDER BY score DESC
SELECT AVG(score) AS average_score, MAX(score) AS max_score, MIN(score) AS min_score FROM student_assessment_results
SELECT * FROM student_assessment_results WHERE score BETWEEN 80 AND 100
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, assessment_score FROM students ORDER BY assessment_score DESC;
SELECT feedback_text, date_created FROM feedbacks WHERE student_id='123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT student_id, student_name, assessment_score FROM students WHERE assessment_score > 80;
SELECT student_name, feedback_text FROM students INNER JOIN feedbacks ON students.student_id = feedbacks.student_id;
SELECT * FROM students WHERE assessment_score > 90 ORDER BY student_name DESC;
SELECT student_name, assessment_score FROM students WHERE feedback IS NOT NULL;
SELECT student_name, assessment_score FROM students WHERE assessment_score BETWEEN 80 AND 90 ORDER BY assessment_score DESC;
SELECT student_name, feedback_text FROM students s JOIN feedbacks f ON s.student_id = f.student_id WHERE f.date_created > '2022-01-01';
SELECT student_name, COUNT(*) AS feedback_count FROM students s JOIN feedbacks f ON s.student_id = f.student_id GROUP BY student_name HAVING feedback_count > 3;
SELECT * FROM students LIMIT 5;
SELECT student_name, class_name, overall_score FROM students WHERE class_name = 'Math';
SELECT student_name, overall_score FROM students WHERE overall_score > 90 ORDER BY overall_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM assessments WHERE assessment_date = '2022-11-15';

SELECT student_name, feedbacks.positive_feedback FROM students JOIN assessments ON students.student_id = assessments.student_id JOIN feedbacks ON assessments.assessment_id = feedbacks.assessment_id WHERE feedbacks.positive_feedback IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT student_name, overall_score FROM students WHERE class_name = 'Mathematics';
SELECT student_id, assessment_date, subject, score FROM assessments WHERE score > 80;

SELECT students.student_name, assessments.score, feedbacks.positive_feedback FROM students JOIN assessments ON students.student_id = assessments.student_id JOIN feedbacks ON assessments.assessment_id = feedbacks.assessment_id;
SELECT AVG(overall_score) AS avg_score, class_name FROM students GROUP BY class_name;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, assessment_score FROM students WHERE assessment_score > 80;
SELECT student_name, assessment_name FROM students JOIN assessments ON students.assessment_score = assessments.total_marks;
SELECT student_name, obtained_marks FROM students JOIN scores ON students.student_id = scores.student_id;
SELECT student_name, feedback FROM students JOIN feedback ON students.student_id = feedback.student_id;
SELECT student_name, assessment_score FROM students;
SELECT assessment_id, total_marks, pass_marks FROM assessments WHERE pass_marks > 50;
SELECT student_name, assessment_name, obtained_marks FROM students JOIN scores ON students.student_id = scores.student_id;
SELECT student_name, assessment_name, feedback FROM students JOIN feedback ON students.student_id = feedback.student_id;

SELECT assessment_name, total_marks, obtained_marks, feedback FROM assessments JOIN scores ON assessments.assessment_id = scores.assessment_id JOIN feedback ON assessments.assessment_id = feedback.assessment_id;
SELECT * FROM student_results;
SELECT student_id, assessment_date, subject FROM student_results ORDER BY assessment_date DESC;
SELECT subject, score FROM student_results WHERE score > 80;
SELECT student_name, age, gender FROM student_info WHERE age BETWEEN 15 AND 18;
SELECT assessment_id, student_id, assessment_type FROM assessment_data WHERE assessment_type LIKE '%final%';
SELECT * FROM student_results ORDER BY assessment_date DESC, score ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT student_name, age, gender FROM student_info WHERE age > 15 AND gender = 'Female';
SELECT student_id, assessment_type, assessment_date FROM assessment_data WHERE assessment_type LIKE 'Midterm%';
SELECT * FROM feedback WHERE feedback_date >= '2022-01-01' AND feedback_date <= '2022-06-30';
SELECT student_name, assessment_type, score FROM student_results JOIN assessment_data ON student_results.student_id = assessment_data.student_id WHERE score > 90 ORDER BY score DESC;
